presentation.title: Imyitozo kubiganiro byawe bitaha!
presentation.message:
Gufata ibibazo byakazi gafite ubwoba no guhangayika?
Birashoboka ko ukomeje kumva utiteguye gufata ibibazo byakazi?
Iyi niyo porogaramu nziza yo kwitoza ubuhanga bwawe bwo kuganira mubikorwa byabajijwe akazi!

presentation.title: Witegure kumurimo wawe utaha!
presentation.message: AKAZI AKAZI Akoresha Imbaraga zubwenge bwubukorikori kugirango ukore ibibazo byangiza akazi kugirango bigufashe gukoresha ubumenyi bwubuzima bukenewe kugirango ushimishe abashaka ubuzima busanzwe kandi bigutera kwitegura kugabanya ikiganiro cyubuzima gikurikira.

presentation.title: Kwiyandikisha kwa Premium:
presentation.message: Akira raporo kurangiza buri kiganiro muri make ikiganiro hamwe nigitekerezo ninama zuburyo bwo kunoza amahirwe yo guhabwa akazi mubiganiro byakazi.

list.title: Siba amateka?
list.message: Uzi neza ko ushaka gusiba amateka yose?

entry.title: Siba ikiganiro?
entry.message: Uzi neza ko ushaka gusiba iki kiganiro?

validation.title: Ikosa ryo kwemeza
validation.invalid_fields:
Shyiramo imyanya yakazi yemewe kugirango usabe ikiganiro gishya cyakazi.
Ubundi

color_scheme.name: Insanganyamatsiko Yijimye
color_scheme.description:
Hitamo hagati yumucyo nuwijimye.
Mu buryo bwikora kugeza ku nsanganyamatsiko y'ibikoresho ubwambere ufungura porogaramu.

language.name: Ururimi
language.description: Hitamo imvugo ihitamo kugirango yerekane mugihe ukoresheje porogaramu no kuganira na AI mugihe cyibiganiro.

cooldown.description:
Verisiyo yubuntu ya porogaramu igufasha gufata ikiganiro kimwe ku isaha.

Niba ushaka kuvana aho bigarukira, kura iyamamaza, kandi wakire raporo y'ibitekerezo ufite inama zuburyo bwo kunoza nyuma ya buri kiganiro, tekereza kwiyandikisha muri Premium.
cooldown.active:
Tegereza igihe cya Cooldown mbere yo kubyara ikiganiro gishya.

Niba ushaka kuvanaho ibikoma, Kuraho amatangazo, no kwakira raporo yigitekerezo hamwe namasezerano inama zuburyo bwo kunoza nyuma ya buri kiganiro, tekereza kwiyandikisha muri Premium.

review.request:
Niba ukunda porogaramu, nyamuneka tekereza gusiga isubiramo kugirango udufashe.

‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê

new_interview.title: Ikiganiro gishya kiboneka!
new_interview.message: Ufite ikiganiro gishya kiboneka gufatanya akazi.

subscription.title: Premium
subscription.thanks: Urakoze kwiyandikisha muri Premium! Twifurije amahirwe masa no gutsinda kubiganiro byawe byose!

error.subscription: Ikosa ryo kugerageza kwemeza ibyo waguze.
error.connection:
Ikosa ryo guhuza.

Ntushobora guhuza ububiko.
error.subscription_options:
Ntibishobora kwishyiriraho gahunda yo kwiyandikisha.

Nyamuneka, reba umurongo wa enterineti, cyangwa ugerageze nyuma.

error.title: Ikosa
error.connection_fix: Reba umurongo wa enterineti hanyuma ugerageze nyuma.

store.short_description: Imyitozo yo kubaza akazi kawe kataha hamwe niyi sigana AI Simulater
store.full_description:
Gufata ibibazo byakazi gafite ubwoba no guhangayika?
Birashoboka ko ukomeje kumva utiteguye gufata ibibazo byakazi?
Iyi niyo porogaramu nziza yo kwitoza ubuhanga bwawe bwo kuganira mubikorwa byabajijwe akazi!

AKAZI AKAZI Akoresha Imbaraga zubwenge bwubukorikori kugirango ukore ibibazo byangiza akazi kugirango bigufashe gukoresha ubuhanga bwo kuganira bukenewe kugirango tumenye neza abashaka

Ibibazo bihujwe numwanya wakazi ushaka, kandi bizahinduka kandi uhindurwe kubibazo bijyanye nintego zawe kugirango uhagararire neza ikiganiro cyakazi.

Abakoresha premium bazakira kandi raporo nyuma ya buri kiganiro muri make ikiganiro hamwe nibitekerezo hamwe nuburyo bwo kunoza amahirwe yo guhabwa akazi mubiganiro byakazi.
taglines: Ace ikiganiro gitaha cyakazi hamwe na Ai!

premium_benefits: Ibibazo bitagira imipaka ntabwo ari cooluwns
Yakira raporo zishingiye kubitekerezo ninama nyuma yibiganiro

translation.title: Fasha Gusobanura
translation.description: Fasha guhindura iyi porogaramu mu zindi ndimi.
